definition: to reject/to expel/to discard/to exclude/to renounce
to abandon/to relinquish/to discard/to throw away

sentences.english: True happiness is of a retired nature, and enemy to pomp and noise.
sentences.chinese: 真正的幸福不显山露水，它摈弃浮华和喧嚣。

sentences.english: Learn to be detached from the world and completely abandoned to God.
sentences.chinese: 学会遗世独立和完全地摈弃自我归靠上帝。

sentences.english: You can put that idea into mothballs and forget it.
sentences.chinese: 你可以摈弃那种想法并把它忘掉。

sentences.english: The Bith have become totally dependent on technology, having long since lost all their animalistic traits and instincts.
sentences.chinese: 他们高度依赖科技，早已摈弃了所有的动物性和本能。

sentences.english: After the scandal, Mr Booth was cast out of the best society.
sentences.chinese: 出了这件丑闻以后，布思先生被上流社会所摈弃。

sentences.english: Modern design has stripped away all that is inessential.
sentences.chinese: 现代设计摈弃了一切可有可无的东西。

sentences.english: She is dangerous. So they dismiss her as a freak.
sentences.chinese: 她是危险的，因此他们将其作为怪物而摈弃。

sentences.english: We must do away with the grandiose style of work.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须摈弃浮夸的工作作风。

sentences.english: The godfather asked his men to deep-six the small-time punks in this area.
sentences.chinese: 神父要求他的人在这个地方要摈弃偏见。

sentences.english: They did away with this barbarous custom.
sentences.chinese: 他们摈弃了这种野蛮风俗。

sentences.english: Eg. We must do away with the grandiose style of work.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须摈弃浮夸的工作作风。

sentences.english: She scorns traditional dress and wears denims.
sentences.chinese: 她摈弃传统服饰，而穿劳动布工作服。

sentences.english: This experience is consistent in country after country, where voluntary agreements are abandoned in favour of legislation.
sentences.chinese: 这是许多摈弃自愿协议，倡导立法的国家的经验。

sentences.english: The ones which are useful are kept, the ones which aren’t are discarded or modified.
sentences.chinese: 有用的将被保留，没用的则会被摈弃或修改。

sentences.english: He has always been a bit of a reprobate.
sentences.chinese: 他很大胆地摈弃了一般常用的那种方式。

definition: to discard/to get rid of/to dispense with
to follow/to abide by/to comply with/compliance
to try everything to avoid/to guard against
(idiom) to continue in the same old rut/diehard conservative attitudes
variant of 煩冗|烦冗[fan2 rong3]
to follow old patterns/to imitate existing models/to continue along the same lines
